title: Jail inmates face new charges after fight in jail
title_page: Jail inmates face new charges after fight in jail
maintext:
Two inmates at the Floyd County Jail face a new felony charge following a fight in the Floyd County Jail.
According to Floyd County Jail reports:
William Shannon Aultman, 36, of Cordele and Tyler Jon Bailey, 24, of 339 Flora Ave., were both charged with felonies for riot in a penal institution and a misdemeanor for affray.
Bailey was actually charged with three counts of affray after the brawl with three other inmates in the A Block at the jail Wednesday afternoon.
Both remain jailed without bond.
